items.title: About
items.summary: Home Office Politics (HOP) has been a long time in the making. We registered this domain a long time ago as a way to educate you about how to make money and save money. We also like to juxtapose working from home with working…
items.content_html: Home Office Politics (HOP) has been a long time in the making. We registered this domain a long time ago as a way to educate you about how to make money and save money. We also like to juxtapose working from home with working in an office.
